spec.label: How did you hear about us?

mapper.content:
Prime Flow Solutions

Smart Automation & Digital Services

Update from Prime Flow Solutions

Hello {{2.answers.`32df60bb`.textAnswers.answers[].value}},

Thank you for reaching out to Prime Flow Solutions. After reviewing your request, we regret to inform you that we are unable to proceed at this time.

Reason: The proposed budget does not align with the minimum requirements needed to deliver quality results for your project.

This decision does not reflect the value of your idea, and we encourage you to reach out again if your budget scope changes in the future.

Wishing you success,
Prime Flow Solutions Team

Stay connected: Prime Flow Solutions on Facebook
mapper.subject: Project Not Approved  Budget Below Minimum Requirement

Prime Flow Solutions

Already Registered Prime Flow Solutions

Hello {{2.answers.`32df60bb`.textAnswers.answers[].value}},

Our system shows that a request has already been submitted using this email address.

If you are waiting for an update, please allow our team some time to complete the review process.

We assure you that your request has not been missed.

For urgent updates or corrections, you may reply directly to this email.

Best regards,
Prime Flow Solutions Team
